abstract.shortdesc: Availability Zones are not configured by default during installation. Use the nova-cloud-configure.yml to configure them post-install.

section.p:
If your system has multiple failure/availability zones defined in your input model, these zones will not get created by default during the installation.
Once the installation has finished, you can run the nova-cloud-configure.yml playbook to configure availability zones and assign compute nodes to those zones based on the configuration specified in the model.
